title: How Do I Uninstall League of Legends ?

replies.body: Alpha Client and main Lol Client can be two different programs. Search for both and make sure you don't leave one behind. Additionally, the alpha uninstall seems to break after uninstalling the main client so do the main client first.
You shouldn't have any problem getting League uninstalled if you go into Control Panel -> Add/Remove Programs and delete League there.
hey can u help out with my problem lower on this board called "client machine broke" i'm getting worried :l
